actions.text: Referred to the House Committee on Foreign Affairs.
Referred to the Subcommittee on Europe, Eurasia, and Emerging Threats.

committees.subcommittee: Subcommittee on Europe, Eurasia, Energy and the Environment

official_title: Congratulating the people of the Republic of Turkey and Turkish Americans nationwide on Turkish Republic Day.

summary.text:
Recognizes the Republic of Turkey as an important security partner of the United States.

 Expresses appreciation for Turkey's contribution to global efforts to combat DAESH/ISIS.

 Acknowledges the unique political, economic, and social challenges confronting the people of Turkey resulting from the influx of refugees caused by the conflicts in neighboring Iraq and Syria.

Commends the contributions of the Turkish American community to the United States.

 Congratulates the people of Turkey and Turkish Americans nationwide on Turkish Republic Day.
